name: Cube Madness
description:
Cube Madness is a cube based Deadly level games!

Take the control of Our hero A nice blue cube and help him reach fresh green cubes white gathering the glowing yellows and saving our selfs from deadly Red's! Seems simple? That's all this game is all about!

This game will challenge your sense of strategy, timing and of course the skill of moving with sliding!

Enjoy 20 levels with highly increasing difficulties. Even while developing I was not able to beat those levels up!

Enjoy, Run, Skip past, find the timing and save yourself! Easy to learn Hard to master!

Features of this game:

1. 20 Level all bringing the diffent type of challenge.

2. Many Many types of enemies!!

3. Simple Environment! Everything is made from CUBES

4. Easy to start with but hard to end the Game!

5. Levels testing strategy!

6. Nice Points system.

7. Getting 3 stars Now that's a real challenge!

8. And much more!! If you find any bugs any issues feel free to comment here as I would love to repair them up! That's how we improve right!
